msbt.message: <100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />各位乘客請注意， 本班機即將到達 。<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="80" /> <100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />請把椅背拉到原來的位置， 並繫好安全帶。<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />本班機即將於水上降落。<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />現在的時間是時分， 晴天， 氣溫還算正常。<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />現在的時間是時分， 陰天， 氣溫還算正常。<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />現在的時間是時分， 正在下雨， 氣溫還算正常。<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />現在的時間是時分， 正在下雪， 氣溫還算正常。<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
